Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: â€¢ People, get in here! It's budget fever! Tax breaks, budget blowouts, and surplus surges have got social media buzzing about Australia's finances. From comments on outrageous MP entitlements to questions about why Australia isn't taking a leaf out of Norway's book, there's a lot of talk going around. The big news is that the country has accomplished a surplus in February, bringing Treasurer Jim Chalmers snuggly within the goal of being the first Labor Treasurer to bring in a budget surplus since Paul Keating. So, are you ready for the budget boom or bust?
